The fire altar is found in Flamtaer in Mort'ton, and is the repaired version of the broken fire altar. It is part of the quest Shades of Mort'ton as well as the Shades of Mort'ton minigame.

The altar may be broken down by the shades, during this minigame, which requires players to repair it, and then light it. After doing so, the lit altar is used to create sacred oil, which is used to turn most types of logs into pyre logs used when cremating shades. The process for creating the oil is described on the minigame's page.

The '''fire altar''' is found in [[Flamtaer]] in [[Mort'ton]], and is the repaired version of the broken fire altar. It is part of the [[quest]] [[Shades of Mort'ton]] as well as the [[Shades of Mort'ton (minigame)|Shades of Mort'ton minigame]].

The altar may be broken down by the shades, during this minigame, which requires players to repair it, and then light it. After doing so, the lit altar is used to create [[sacred oil]], which is used to turn most types of logs into [[pyre logs]] used when cremating shades. The process for creating the oil is described on the [[Shades of Mort'ton (minigame)#Sanctifying the oil|minigame's page]].
